trans-unit.source: Provides methods and fields to manage the input language.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder og for å administrere det angitte språket.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: An input language is a culture/keyboard layout pair that determines how the physical keys on a keyboard map or plot to characters in a language.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte språket er kultur/tastatur oppsettet to som bestemmer hvordan fysisk nøklene på et tastatur tilordne eller til å tegne tegn i et språk.

trans-unit.source: The input language is based on a Windows input locale identifier, such as that returned by the Platform SDK function, `GetKeyboardLayout`.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte språket som er basert på en Windows nasjonale-IDen, for eksempel som ble returnert av funksjonen Platform SDK `GetKeyboardLayout`.

trans-unit.source: The input locale identifier is also called a handle to a keyboard layout (HKL) value.
trans-unit.target: IDen for nasjonal innstilling inndata kalles også en referanse til en verdi for tastatur oppsettet (HKL).

trans-unit.source: Use the `static` methods provided to find all installed mappings of the system and to change the input language for a thread or process.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `static` metodene for å finne alle installert tilordninger i systemet, og for å endre inndata språk for en tråd eller prosess.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.CurrentInputLanguage%2A> to get the current input language.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.CurrentInputLanguage%2A>å hente gjeldende inndata språk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.CurrentInputLanguage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.DefaultInputLanguage%2A> for the default input language.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.DefaultInputLanguage%2A>for inndata standardspråket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.DefaultInputLanguage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages%2A> to get all the installed languages in this system.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages%2A>ikke hente alle installerte språk i systemet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have a list of all the installed languages, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.CurrentInputLanguage%2A> to change the current input language to a different language.
trans-unit.target: Når du har en liste over alle installerte språk, kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.CurrentInputLanguage%2A>til å endre gjeldende inndata språk til et annet språk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage.CurrentInputLanguage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture of the current input language.
trans-unit.target: Henter kultur for gjeldende inndata språk.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that represents the culture of the current input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som representerer kultur for gjeldende inndata språk.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input language for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir inndata språket for gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"></xref> that represents the input language for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"> </xref> som representerer inndata språket for gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: The input language is not recognized by the system.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte språket gjenkjennes ikke av systemet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default input language for the system.
trans-unit.target: Henter inndata standardspråket for systemet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"></xref> representing the default input language for the system.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"> </xref> som representerer standard angi språket for systemet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether two input languages are equal.
trans-unit.target: Angir om to inndata språk er like.

trans-unit.source: The language to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: Språket du vil teste likhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two languages are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de to språkene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the input language associated with the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det angitte språket knyttet til den angitte kulturen.

trans-unit.source: The FromCulture method selects from among installed keyboards.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FromCulture velger blant installerte tastatur.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this method performs the following operations: 1.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt denne metoden utfører følgende operasjoner: 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the LCID associated with `culture`.
trans-unit.target: Henter LCID tilknyttet `culture`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the full list of available input language identifiers (HKLs) from the `GetKeyboardLayoutList` function.
trans-unit.target: Henter den fullstendige listen over tilgjengelige inndata språk-IDer (HKLs) fra den `GetKeyboardLayoutList` funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: Finds the HKL that corresponds to the LCID from `culture`, if one is present.
trans-unit.target: Finner HKL som samsvarer med LCID fra `culture`, hvis det finnes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the installed keyboard associated with that HKL.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer installert tastaturet som er forbundet med denne HKL.

trans-unit.source: If no keyboard is found, returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen tastatur, returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FromCulture method never tries to load or install an additional keyboard if one has not already been installed for `culture`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For FromCulture metoden aldri prøver å laste inn eller Installer et ekstra tastatur hvis én ikke er installert `culture`.

trans-unit.source: Use the Platform SDK function, `LoadKeyboardLayout`, to install an additional keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Bruk funksjonen Platform SDK `LoadKeyboardLayout`, for å installere en ekstra tastatur.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen til å konvertere fra.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"></xref> that represents the previously selected input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"> </xref> som representerer det tidligere valgte inndata språket.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this input language.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for dette inndata språket.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this input language.
trans-unit.target: Hashkoden for dette inndata språket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle for the input language.
trans-unit.target: Henter referansen for det angitte språket.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that represents the handle of this input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>som representerer behandlingen av dette inndata språket.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all installed input languages.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over alle installerte inndata språk.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"></xref> objects that represent the input languages installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage"> </xref> objekter som representerer språk for inndata som er installert på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current keyboard layout as it appears in the regional settings of the operating system on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på det gjeldende oppsettet slik det vises i de regionale innstillingene for operativsystemet på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the layout.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på oppsettet.
